Title: Saare Jahaan Se Mehnga...
Writer: Vijay Manral, Mr. Moris (screenplay), Roopesh Thapliyal, Rupesh Thapliyal
Actors: Vishwa Mohan Badola, Ranjan Chhabra, Zakir Hussain, Sanjay Mishra
Plot: A satire on inflation-hit middle-class Indian family from a small city in North India. The story revolves around our protagonist who is struggling to survive in this spiraling inflation and...
